doc.title: Felix the Cat Kept on Walking
doc.plot: After Felix is thrown out of the house for walking on the piano keys, he meets a poet who tells him that riches are beyond the horizon. He walks to England, where he is chased by immigration officers and escapes on a horse he steals from a statue. He comes across a group of soccer players, who kick him across the continent and he lands in Egypt. After finding no riches there either, he encounters the poet again, and takes his revenge.
